name: Ninja (itch) (alstonchan64)
description:
Ninja is a 2D bullet hell roguelike focused on looting. 

Prototype created by Alston Chan in 9 weeks.

Youtube Playlist of Devlogs: http://bit.ly/alstondevlogs

Latest Devlog: 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD to move.

Left click to shoot.

Space to dodge.

Tab for inventory.

C for crafting.

Right click to equip and use items.

Drag and drop items outside of inventory to destroy.

Escape to pause.
